overview: The Eater's Bone is a pet-summoning item which summons a Baby Eater pet that follows the player around. The Eater's Bone has a 1/20 (5%) chance of being dropped by the Eater of Worlds.
The Baby Eater pet will not teleport to the player when it is far away, unlike most other pets.
title: Eater's Bone
tooltip: Summons a Baby Eater of Souls

grant.tooltip: A baby Eater of Souls is following you
